events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back following an incorrect item delivery.
Assigning this refund request case to agent Lisa M. for further handling and resolution.
Hello! I’m Lisa from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order, and I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and proceed with the refund?
Sure, the order number is 4578921. Attached is a photo showing the incorrect product I received instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. You do not need to return the wrong item.
Thanks for the quick response and for not requiring me to return the item. I appreciate your help resolving this so smoothly.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear in your account.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
The refund case has been closed after confirmation of receipt. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
